title: Help Need S on Varus
body: {{champion:110}} its so hard to get my first S on lol and its on varus help

replies.body:
farm 
just afk bot 
and farm
ydb

Dedication is important, have fun with him while trying to improve the small things, since the small things will get you your cs's. So farm as much as you can without missing any in-lane and help your team as much as possible when it comes to objectives.
One of my friends plays him on support if his team trolls him in champ select. He's gotten S+'s easily by doing this. Whatever you do, have fun!

Drastically improve your cs on him. 1 game in your last 8 as varus you managed 3 cs a minute the rest of those games you were below that. 3cs a minute isn't good and that will be holding you back on getting an S
Varus is a VERY easy champion to play, so it'd be hard to get an S on him as so many people spam play him.

Just keep playing and you'll get it eventually, i have 4 mastery 7 champsa and 6 mastery 6 champs, all you need to do is just play and you'll get one eventually, try to die as little as possible and farm up as much as you can to get fed and you'll eventually get it.
